scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspaces --if-present && echo 'rimraf node_modules' && rimraf node_modules
scripts.prep-lambdas: cd packages/lambdas && npm run prep-deploy && npm ci --ignore-scripts --no-fund && npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test && cd ../..
scripts.prep-deploy: npm run install-deps && npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test && npm run prep-lambdas
scripts.prep-deploy-staging: npm run install-deps && npm run lint && npm run build:staging && npm run test && npm run prep-lambdas
scripts.install-deps: npm ci --ignore-scripts --no-fund && cd packages/lambdas && pwd && npm ci --ignore-scripts --no-fund && cd ../.. && pwd
scripts.build: npm run build --workspaces && cd packages/lambdas && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.version:alpha: npm run build && npx lerna version --dist-tag next
scripts.version: npm run build && npx lerna version
scripts.publish:alpha: npm run build && npx lerna publish --dist-tag next
scripts.publish: npm run build && npx lerna publish
